text: Part 5. Volume profiling principles including symmetry, day types, price behaviour and the trading process. Paul Tudor Jones once said, The most important rule of trading is to play great defence, not great offence. Every day I assume every position I have is wrong. I do that so I can define my maximum possible drawdown. Hopefully, I spend the rest of the day enjoying positions that are going in my direction. If they are going against me, then I have a game plan for getting out.
